decks.notes: The main concept of this Gruul Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm your opponent with aggressive creatures and efficient spells. By utilizing cards like Monastery Swiftspear and Emberheart Challenger, along with burn spells like Shock and Turn Inside Out, you can put pressure on your opponent early and maintain it throughout the game. The deck also includes cards like Slickshot Show-Off and Leyline of Resonance to further amplify your aggression. With a focus on speed and direct damage, this deck is designed to win games quickly and decisively.

This deck focuses on a fast-paced aggressive strategy, utilizing low-cost creatures with abilities that can quickly overwhelm the opponent. The deck includes a mix of efficient creatures like Regal Bunnicorn and Warden of the Inner Sky, as well as evasive threats like Spyglass Siren and Mockingbird. By leveraging cards like Zoetic Glyph and Sheltered by Ghosts to protect key creatures, the deck aims to establish an early board presence and maintain pressure on the opponent throughout the game. The inclusion of Unidentified Hovership and Subterranean Schooner provides additional evasive threats to further press the advantage.

The primary focus of this deck is to quickly and aggressively control the board with a combination of removal spells like Cut Down and Go for the Throat, along with powerful creatures like Tinybones, Marchesa, and Sheoldred. The deck also utilizes a mix of legendary artifacts and creatures to generate additional value and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the color requirements of the spells and creatures in the deck, allowing for consistent and powerful plays throughout the game.

This Mardu aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a mix of efficient creatures and aggressive spells. The deck aims to consistently apply pressure to the opponent while using spells like Monstrous Rage and Might of the Meek to buff creatures and push through damage. Additionally, Leyline of Resonance helps to control the board and Turn Inside Out can surprise opponents by unexpectedly increasing the power of creatures. This deck prioritizes speed and aggression to establish dominance early in the game.

The deck consists of a mix of aggressive creatures and spells that aim to put pressure on the opponent early in the game. It includes cards that can disrupt the opponent's strategy, as well as those that can generate card advantage. The mana base is designed to support a three-color aggro strategy, with a focus on casting creatures quickly and efficiently. The end goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and relentless assault, making the most out of the aggressive synergies within the Jeskai colors.

The deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with powerful creatures and then bringing them back onto the battlefield to overwhelm the opponent. It utilizes a combination of cards that offer graveyard manipulation, reanimation spells, and powerful creatures to create a powerful synergistic combo. By strategically using cards like The Tale of Tamiyo and Breach the Multiverse to set up the graveyard, followed by cards like Reenact the Crime and Atraxa, Grand Unifier to bring back multiple creatures at once, the deck aims to outvalue and outpace the opponent.

The Golgari Control deck focuses on using a combination of removal spells, creature abilities, and planeswalkers to dominate the battlefield and disrupt the opponent's strategy. By utilizing cards like Vraska, Betrayal's Sting, Glissa Sunslayer, and Liliana of the Veil, along with efficient removal spells like Go for the Throat and Cut Down, the deck aims to control the game and outvalue the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Deep-Cavern Bat and Mosswood Dreadknight for additional control and threat presence. The goal is to outlast the opponent and win through attrition.

The deck focuses on fast and aggressive gameplay, centered around Rakdos creatures and burn spells. It aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creature plays and direct damage spells to finish them off. The deck includes various aggressive creatures like Preacher of the Schism, Undead Sprinter, and Overlord of the Boilerbilges, as well as burn spells like Torch the Tower and Molten Collapse. With a mix of creatures and direct damage, the deck seeks to apply constant pressure on the opponent and win the game swiftly.

The primary focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. By playing low-cost creatures like Cacophony Scamp and Monastery Swiftspear, along with efficient removal spells like Monstrous Rage and Turn Inside Out, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently. The inclusion of cards like Painter's Studio/Defaced Gallery and Mirran Banesplitter provide additional ways to boost the effectiveness of the creatures in combat. Overall, this deck is designed to apply constant pressure and swiftly defeat the opponent.
